text: Colyton Grammar School is a grammar school in the village of Colyford in England. It was started in 1546. 49.4% of GCSEs in 2013 were A*, an increase of 4% on the past year, and 68.5% of A-levels were A*-A.http://www.exeterexpressandecho.co.uk/GCSE-Results-Colyton-Grammar- School/story-19693474-detail/story.html Ofsted rated the school as outstanding. ==References== Category:Grammar schools in England Category:1546 establishments in England Category:East Devon Category:Organisations based in Devon ]
title: Colyton Grammar School
